app_subtitle: Enter your PC specs to discover your potential in the world of open-source generative AI.
no_results_subtitle: Try increasing the RAM or selecting a different GPU. Some models may require more resources than you have available.
note_optimal_all_in_vram: Optimal solution: all components reside in VRAM.
note_possible_offload: Fallback solution: requires offloading to system RAM.
note_possible_ram_usage: Estimated RAM: {used}GB (of which {offloaded}GB is offloaded from VRAM).
note_warning_heavy_offload: WARNING: The offload is very heavy. Performance may be low, and there is a higher risk of instability or crashes.
footer_disclaimer: Disclaimer: The results provided are for illustrative purposes only. Actual performance may vary based on software optimizations, drivers, and specific system configurations.
